title: Final Frontier
description: Commander George Samuel Kirk was aboard the Enterprise under the command of Captain Robert April before his famous son was born. Starfleet has just been founded and the Enterprise has just been built, and is sent on its first mission. The mission takes the Enterprise into the heart of hostile Romulan territory, where cosmopolitical machinations and advanced weapons technology will decide the fate of a hundred innocent worlds.1 Audio Cassette, runtime 1 hr 30 mins, Abridged. Leonard Nimoy and James Doohan, narrators
author: Diane Carey
